name: Community West Bancshares
description: Community West Bancshares is a financial services company based in Goleta, California, dedicated to providing a comprehensive range of banking services primarily to small businesses and individuals in California. Founded in 1989, the company operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Community West Bank, which offers a variety of products including business loans, personal loans, deposit accounts, and other financial services. With a strong focus on community engagement, Community West Bancshares aims to support local economies by providing financing solutions tailored to the needs of small businesses. The bank prides itself on building long-lasting relationships with its customers, emphasizing personalized service and community involvement. With a commitment to responsible banking practices, the company also integrates technology to enhance customer experiences, offering online banking and mobile banking services. As a publicly traded entity, Community West Bancshares continues to explore growth opportunities while maintaining its mission to enhance the financial well-being of its clients and the communities it serves.

seo.meta_title: Community West Bancshares | Banking for Small Businesses and Individuals
seo.meta_description: Community West Bancshares offers a variety of banking services focused on the needs of small businesses and individuals in California. Explore our financial products and community commitment.

faq.question: What services does Community West Bancshares offer?
faq.answer: Community West Bancshares offers business loans, personal loans, deposit accounts, and various financial services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Community West Bancshares?
faq.answer: Martin E. Plourd is the CEO of Community West Bancshares.

faq.question: Where is Community West Bancshares headquartered?
faq.answer: Community West Bancshares is headquartered in Goleta, California, USA.

faq.question: When was Community West Bancshares founded?
faq.answer: Community West Bancshares was founded in 1989.
